answers.answer: I had gd with my first.  I had natural birth at 39 weeks.  Estimated weight was 9-10 lbs. And she was only 5 lbs.   I did not need medication for the gd just checked myself everyday and kept track of my numbers

I had gd with my 1st child 2 years ago and it was just diet controlled. I had a healthy baby, natural Birth at 38 weeks 4 days (stretch and sweep worked) if it didn't was going to be induced at 39 weeks. They said she was going to be 9lb plus and she was 6lb10. Don't worry u will be fine

They wanted me to deliver her early as they said on the scan she was measuring 9lbs or more but she was only 6lb 10. They never once mentioned c section to me so I wouldn't worry. I am now pregnant with my second and don't have GD up to now fingers crossed bt my blood pressure is slightlying high this time and I'm only 16 weeks bt urine was fine so they've put me on meds to lower my BP but I'm worried about that and if It will develop into preeclampsia :( they said hopefully not as being fully monitored but there's risk of c section with this I read so I'm worried but my mam had 2 c sections and said they r fine but I'd  deliver vaginally like last time too. Also my gd blood sugars never were high until I went into labour and then they shot up bt they injected me with insulin and I and baby were fine. hope that helps,sorry for the essay haha

question: Can you please share your experience. I would like to know if you were able to have the baby without any complications. Did you have Vaginal Birth??
title: Any one had gestational diabetes with previous pregnancy?
